name: Design Quest
description:
It's been 3 months since you completed your Masters in Media Design. It's about time you start making a name for yourself. You search for job opportunities on the Internet, Newspapers and even with the contacts you made during your University years.

You apply and apply and apply but, no one seems interested in paying your rates. You still lack the reputation for people to trust your work. However, if you start undercharging, you risk not being able to pay your monthly bills.

Will you bite the bullet and do a couple of cheap jobs just to make a portfolio or, will you try to charge what's a fair price for your work?
